attributes.action: help us stop violating groups on facebook please.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hi
i am writing to you on behalf of 60,000 plus people , about this group called dead babies make me laugh, this is very disturbing and intolerant.
this is very upsetting that this is allowed on facebook.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
